title: Junior/Mid/Senior Web Developer
education: Bachelors in Computer Science/Computer Engineering/CIS/ or Code Camp certification. Depending on experience, education is not required.
scope: This role will involve developing a range of projects to be on time, on budget and within the project scope. This position is specifically looking for a developer with proficiency in either Angular, VueJs, or React (with a higher priority in Angular and VueJs). This position is on-site only, no remote work. Candidate must be able to work independently or within a team. Position requires to be onsite with occasional travel to client sites. Contact switching is a highly desirable skillset.
description: Orange Bees is a leader in the upstate region of South Carolina for its world-class software development. Established in 2013, Orange Bees, aim to improve the manufacturing, insurance, financial, association, and retail industries; where we have an extensive track record of success in Product Engineering, Enterprise Management, System Integration, Mobile Application Development, Web Application Development, and Data Analytics.
responsibilities: Write frontend code in a clean and efficient manner
Communicate with other teammates respectably and be able to work on projects with a few developers
Visit client sites on occasion and represent the company in meetings
experience: 1.5-2 years of experience with Enterprise applications
Experience working in an Agile environment (preferred)
knowledge: Understanding of Software Development Life Cycle and Agile methodologies.
Profiency in one of the above listed JavaScript frameworks
